Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the public service commission reviewing broadband and fiber optic services within the state
Summary: Requires the public service commission to review broadband and fiber optic services within the state; requires the expansion of broadband and fiber optic services.
LawCode: Add ยง224-c, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to the public service commission reviewing broadband and fiber optic services within the state
